H0.text: when did they stop putting lead in paint. 1978

H1.text: when did they stop putting lead in paint. 1960

H2.text: when did they stop putting lead in paint. 1985

H3.text: when did they stop putting lead in paint. 1992

A4.text: Although lead has been banned from household paints in the United States since 1978

A5.text: In the United Kingdom, lead paint was banned from sale to the general public in 1992

A6.text: The United States banned the manufacture of lead-based house paint in 1978 due to health concerns

A7.text: Homes built after 1978 are unlikely to have lead-based paint
